document_data.name: Stone Guard
document_data.mainbody: The '''Stone Guard''' was a military corp in [[Gracklstugh]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. They served Deepking [[Horgar Steelshadow V]] as bodyguards, elite soldiers, and secret police.
document_data.History:
In the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], [[Horgar Steelshadow IV]] purged the Stone Guard of corrupt elements and installed captains and soldiers who were loyal to him, thus establishing a power base for when he took power ''circa'' [[1372 DR]].

''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], corrupt members like [[Gorglak]] were present again within the organization, but high-ranking members and their commander [[Errde Blackskull]] were busy hunting for a more demonic corruption within the people of the city.
